did.unittitle: U.S. Women's Bureau "The Employment and Unemployment of Negro Women" Manuscript, 1934
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "The Employment and Unemployment of Negro Women," from the U.S. Department of Labor Women's Bureau, July 1934.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an 11-page mimeographed report, "The Employment and Unemployment of Negro Women," from the U.S. Department of Labor Women's Bureau, July 1934.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
